name: Lost at Sea (jacksaull)
description:
Lost at Sea:

Description:

Swim your way from one side of the level to the other whilst collecting glowing fish for points and avoiding sharks and jellyfish.

Aim:

Get the highest score from each level by completing each level as quick as possible, with the most health and most points collected.

Controls:

WASD, E to use Repel Ability, Space to use Boost Ability

How to Play:

Download the executable file and folders.
